{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Dell Wireless 1390 WLAN Mini-Card |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Dell_Wireless_1390_(DW1390) |wikipedia = |brand = Dell |model = Wireless 1390 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = DW1390 |sernum = |wlclass = G54 |series = |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 14e4 |device_id = 4311 |subvendor_id = 1028 |subdevice_id = 0007 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = QDS-BRCM1020 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:16:CE, 00:16:CF, 00:18:F3, 00:19:7D, 00:19:7E, 00:1A:92, 00:1C:26, 00:1D:60, 00:1E:4C, 00:1F:3A |chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4311;BCM4311KFBG, CD0743 P11, 843691 B5; |chip2 = Broadcom;BCM2050;BCM2050KMLG; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna2 = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = T60H938 |manuf_rev = .00 |addchip = 2.4GHz Front End Module;SiGe;SE2521A60;SiGe, 2521A60, 7289D;1;;24-pin LGA; |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/22/2005 |estreldate = |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B005V9ADB6 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :DW1390 / DW 1390 The devices seem to be predominantly '''[[Foxconn]]''' manufactured: *[[Foxconn T60H938]] FCC ID: QDS-BRCM1020 (06/22/2005).. but the presence of '''[[ASUS]]Tek''' OUIs seems to indicated that some of these are ''[[ASUS]]Tek'' manufactured.. (??) ==Notes== ===lspci -nnv dump=== 
05:00.0 Network controller [0280]: Broadcom Corporation BCM4311 
        802.11b/g WLAN [14e4:4311] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: Dell Wireless 1390 WLAN Mini-Card [1028:0007]
        Physical Slot: 1
        Flags: bus master, fast devsel, latency 0, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=16K]
        Capabilities: [40] Power Management version 2
        Capabilities: [58] MSI: Enable- Count=1/1 Maskable- 64bit-
        Capabilities: [d0] Express Legacy Endpoint, MSI 00
        Capabilities: [100] Advanced Error Reporting
        Capabilities: [13c] Virtual Channel
        Kernel driver in use: b43-pci-bridge
